pages.text: $(l)How do I contribute to this mod's development?$()$(2br)$(li)If you can translate to another (missing) language, hop on the discord server.$(li)If you find bugs, report them.$(li)Add the mod to your modpacks, tell your fellow minecraft players about it.$(li)Provide feedback on discord!$(li)Donate to one of us :)
All the relevant links can be found $(l:meta/links)here$().
